About the Company: Samrat Pharmachem Ltd is is currently engaged in manufacturing iodine salts & bromine salts.The finished products produced by the company are used in various industries like Pharmaceuticals, Chemicals, Food, Fertilizer, Salt, etc.The product range of the company includes Calcium Iodate Monohydrate,Copper Iodide,Hydriodic Acid 47%,Hydriodic Acid 57%,Iodine,Iodine Monochloride,Iodoethane (Ethyl iodide),Iodomethane (Methyl iodide),Potassium Bromide,Potassium Iodate,Potassium Iodide,Potassium Metaperiodate,Sodium Iodate,Sodium Iodide,Sodium Metaperiodate and Trimethyl Sulfoxoniumiodide.
